Import Proc
Here I am importing data

```{r}
library(haven)
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)

airline
```

Data wrangle
Here I am cleaning up the data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(airline) +
 aes(x = Y, y = W, colour = "red") +
 geom_point(size = 1L) +
 scale_color_hue() +
 theme_minimal()
```
